abstract: Google’s revenue was just short of analysts’ forecasts, while cost-cutting measures helped push profit above expectations.
snippet: Google’s revenue was just short of analysts’ forecasts, while cost-cutting measures helped push profit above expectations.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The slumping economy has broken Google’s streak: The Internet search giant said Thursday that it had its first decline in revenue compared with the previous quarter since it went public in 2004, as marketers reined in their online advertising budgets.

headline.main: Google’s Profit Is Up 8%, Beating Analysts’ Estimates
headline.print_headline: Google’s Profit Is Up 8%, Beating Analysts’ Estimates
